author: Makena Kelly
title: A pro-Iranian operation has spread coronavirus disinformation across Facebook and Twitter
description: Over the last few weeks, a pro-Iranian operation has been spreading disinformation suggesting that the US created the coronavirus pandemic and is harming Iran’s ability to combat the disease.
content:
The IUVM has accused the US of creating the disease
As the novel coronavirus pandemic has swept across the world over the last few weeks, a pro-Iranian influence operation has spread disinformation over social media suggesting that the US government created … [+2839 chars]
